name: soyo-monorepo
description: SOYO (Story Of Your Own) - Full-stack story writing platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules backend/uploads/images/* frontend/dist backend/logs
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && npm test || echo 'Backend tests not configured'
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm test || echo 'Frontend tests not configured'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
